articles.title: About this Website
articles.description: Why there are analyses of inaugural speeches by Texan presidents on this page? And some acknowledgements.
articles.contents:
Lars HinrichsMy name is Lars Hinrichs. You can find more information about me here, and about the Texas English Linguistics Lab here.
Presented on this blog are some analyses of the language that was used in the “Texan” inaugural addresses that the country has had so far. I made these to prepare for our segment about Texan inaugurals on The Texas Standard.
The Texas Standard, hosted by David Brown, is a news magazine that airs weekdays on KUT Public Radio in Austin.
The Texan Translation segment is produced by Michael Marks.
Analyses were conducted in R (R Core Team 2020) and tidyverse (Wickham et al. 2019) using the RStudio GUI (RStudio Team 2020).
The text of the inaugural addresses was obtained from the quanteda R-package (Benoit et al. 2018).
This website was made using the distill package for R (Allaire et al. 2020).
Code for this website is hosted at this Github repo.



Allaire, J. J., Rich Iannone, Alison Presmanes Hill, and Yihui Xie. 2020. Distill: ’r Markdown’ Format for Scientific and Technical Writing. https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=distill.


Benoit, Kenneth, Kohei Watanabe, Haiyan Wang, Paul Nulty, Adam Obeng, Stefan Müller, and Akitaka Matsuo. 2018. “Quanteda: An r Package for the Quantitative Analysis of Textual Data.” Journal of Open Source Software 3 (30): 774. https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.00774.


R Core Team. 2020. R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing. Vienna, Austria: R Foundation for Statistical Computing. https://www.R-project.org/.


RStudio Team. 2020. RStudio: Integrated Development Environment for r. Boston, MA: RStudio, PBC. http://www.rstudio.com/.


Wickham, Hadley, Mara Averick, Jennifer Bryan, Winston Chang, Lucy D’Agostino McGowan, Romain François, Garrett Grolemund, et al. 2019. “Welcome to the Tidyverse.” Journal of Open Source Software 4 (43): 1686. https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.01686.
